mapper.select: select commodity.barcode, multibarcode.barcode as m_barcode from commodity left outer join multibarcode on commodity.id = multibarcode.com_id and commodity.is_deleted = 0 and multibarcode.is_deleted = 0 where (commodity.barcode = #{commodity.barcode} or multibarcode.barcode = #{commodity.barcode}) and sup_id = #{commodity.supId}

select c1.id as parent_id, c1.sup_id as sup_id, c1.name as parent_name, c1.barcode as parent_barcode, c1.purchase_price as parent_purchase_price, c2.specification as child_specification, c2.id as child_id, c2.name as child_name, c2.barcode as child_barcode, c2.parent as parent, c2.purchase_price as child_purchase_price from commodity c1 inner join commodity c2 on c1.id = c2.parent where c1.is_deleted = 0 and c2.is_deleted = 0 and c1.sup_id = #{supId} and c2.sup_id = #{supId}

with myTable as (select c1.id as parent_id, c1.sup_id as sup_id, c1.name as parent_name, c1.barcode as parent_barcode, c1.purchase_price as parent_purchase_price, c2.specification as child_specification, c2.id as child_id, c2.name as child_name, c2.barcode as child_barcode, c2.parent as parent, c2.purchase_price as child_purchase_price from commodity c1 inner join commodity c2 on c1.id = c2.parent where c1.is_deleted = 0 and c2.is_deleted = 0 and c1.sup_id = #{commodity.supId} and c2.sup_id = #{commodity.supId}) select * from myTable where parent_name like '%${commodity.name}%' or parent_barcode like '%${commodity.name}%' or child_name like '%${commodity.name}%' or child_barcode like '%${commodity.name}%'
